attributes.action: supply free solar panels to every household in the uk rather than buy new nuclear reactors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government should supply free solar panels and all equipment needed to run the service to all households in the uk starting from the poorest to the richest.

any unused power after costs for equipmwnt are met can be sold back into the national grid to help support industries useage.

the costs for this would be approx £10000 per house which i believe would be payed back in under 5 yrs due to savings and also this would help the uk reach its emmissions targets more easily.

All houses would be getting free heating and some of their essential electricity for free.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
